section.title: Maintaining a list of Modules
section.para: The script gen_makefile.pl maintains a list of modules and headers across all makefiles that are distributed as part of Freecell Solver.
Notice that the Win32 makefile is generated from a hard-coded template, while the other makefiles are read and modified by it.
